insert.foreach: insert into public.sign_in_info (sign_in_info_id, sign_id ,curriculum_id, student_id, sign_flag, create_at, update_at) values (#{signInfo.signInInfoId},#{signInfo.signId}, #{signInfo.studentId},#{signInfo.signFlag},#{signInfo.createAt},#{signInfo.updateAt})

mapper.insert: insert into public.sign_in_info (sign_in_info_id, sign_id ,curriculum_id,student_id, sign_flag, create_at, update_at) values (#{signInInfoId},#{signId},#{curriculumId},#{studentId},#{signFlag},#{createAt},#{updateAt})
mapper.select: select sii.student_id,sign_in_info_id,u.user_name,sign_flag,sii.sign_id from public.sign_in_info sii left join public.wx_user u on sii.student_id=u.user_id where sign_id=#{signId} order by sii.sign_flag
select student_id,count(*) from sign_in_info where curriculum_id=#{curriculumId} and sign_flag=0 group by student_id
select user_name,count(*) successSignNum from sign_in_info sii join wx_user wu on sii.student_id=wu.user_id where curriculum_id=#{curriculumId} and sign_flag=1 group by sii.student_id,user_name
select count(*) from sign_in_info where student_id=#{studentId} and sign_flag=1
